thread.title: Yoohwan Kim | University of Nevada, Las Vegas
thread.title_full: Yoohwan Kim | University of Nevada, Las Vegas

title: Yoohwan Kim | University of Nevada, Las Vegas
text:
Professor Yoohwan Kim (Computer Science) has been recognized by [EC-Council](https://www.eccouncil.org/ec-council-in-news/2024-leading-global-cybersecurity-programs-and-instructors-announced-by-ec-council/) as an Academia Instructor Circle of Excellence winner for 2024.
The EC-Council recognizes award winning partners and instructors from across the world that have had lasting impacts on cybersecurity education and student success. The award recipients include a diverse group of institutions and faculty, selected from over 2,000 academic institutions in over 130 countries, which provide cybersecurity education and experiential learning models.
“I am really honored to receive this prestigious award. While teaching our students cybersecurity, I was impressed with all the support from EC-Council including its materials, labs, CTFs, certifications, and special pricing for our students, which were all excellent. I believe EC-Council offers an excellent value in cybersecurity education.”
The EC-Council Academia division partners with leading cybersecurity programs, including over 200 of the National Centers for Academic Excellence (NCAEs) of which UNLV is one.
